alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Union; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 11:55AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Nassau, northeastern Bradford, northwestern St. Johns, Baker, Union, northern Clay, Duval, southeastern Ware and southeastern Charlton Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1155 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southeast of Stephen Foster State Park to near Groves. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, St. Marys, Fernandina Beach, Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Hilliard, Lake Butler, Callahan, Raiford and Jacksonville International Arpt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Union; Western Duval
